entities.name: BOARD
entities.description: The Board is responsible for the discretion of granting RSUs under the Plan and can amend, modify, suspend, or terminate the Plan at any time.

entities.name: COMPANY
entities.description: The Company is the entity to which unvested RSUs are forfeited and returned without cost upon termination of Continuous Service.

entities.name: NVIDIA CORPORATION
entities.description: NVIDIA Corporation is a company located in Santa Clara, California, United States, associated with the financial risk statement regarding shares of Common Stock.

relationships.relationship_description: The Board manages the Plan under which RSUs are granted, which involves the Company where unvested RSUs are returned upon termination of Continuous Service.
NVIDIA Corporation is associated with the financial risk statement regarding shares of Common Stock for the Company.
